title: HDFC Bank launches instant SIP feature via SmartWealth app for quick MF investments
description: HDFC Bank has updated its SmartWealth app to include Instant SIP, allowing users to invest in mutual funds on the same day they spot an opportunity. The app also features a revamped Unified Dashboard for a consolidated view of investments and enhanced Streamlined Deposits for quicker deposit booking and better interest rates.
